mapper.sql: ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id, ysh_enterprise_info.account_name, ysh_enterprise_info.identification, ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_name, ysh_enterprise_info.profile, ysh_enterprise_info.img_url, ysh_enterprise_info.business_license_no, ysh_enterprise_info.legal_person, ysh_enterprise_info.register_address, ysh_enterprise_info.province_id, ysh_enterprise_info.city_id, ysh_enterprise_info.district_id, ysh_enterprise_info.addr_detail, ysh_enterprise_info.address, ysh_enterprise_info.mobile, ysh_enterprise_info.linkman, ysh_enterprise_info.link_mobile, ysh_enterprise_info.business_start_time, ysh_enterprise_info.business_end_time
mapper.select: select , ysh_enterprise_manager.username from ysh_enterprise_info left join ysh_enterprise_manager on ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id = ysh_enterprise_manager.enterprise_id where ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ysh_enterprise_manager.is_primary = true
select enterprise_id,enterprise_name,account_name from ysh_enterprise_info where (select end from ysh_enterprise_func where id = ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id) = 1
select from ysh_enterprise_info where account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (select end from ysh_enterprise_func where id = ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id) = 1

select , ysh_enterprise_manager.username, ysh_enterprise_func.discount_pct, ysh_enterprise_func.end, ysh_enterprise_func.has_permit from ysh_enterprise_info left join ysh_enterprise_func on ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id = ysh_enterprise_func.id left join ysh_enterprise_manager on ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id = ysh_enterprise_manager.enterprise_id where ysh_enterprise_func.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ysh_enterprise_manager.is_primary = true order by ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id desc

select ,
from ysh_enterprise_info left join ysh_enterprise_func on ysh_enterprise_func.id = ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id where ysh_enterprise_func.parent_id is null

select distinct
from ysh_enterprise_info right join ysh_custom_ucion on ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id = ysh_custom_ucion.enterprise_id where ysh_custom_ucion.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id != (select id from ysh_enterprise_func where parent_id is null) and (select end from ysh_enterprise_func where id = ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id) = 1

select
from ysh_enterprise_info where ysh_enterprise_info.district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id != (select id from ysh_enterprise_func where parent_id is null) and (select end from ysh_enterprise_func where id = ysh_enterprise_info.enterprise_id) = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ysh_enterprise_info (enterprise_id, account_name,identification, enterprise_name, profile, img_url, business_license_no, legal_person, register_address, province_id, city_id, district_id, addr_detail, address, mobile, linkman, link_mobile, business_start_time, business_end_time) values (#{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update ysh_enterprise_info
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identification = #{identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profile = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_license_no = #{businessLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_address = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
addr_detail = #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_mobile = #{linkMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_start_time = #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
business_end_time = #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ysh_enterprise_info set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identification = #{identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license_no = #{businessLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_address = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, addr_detail = #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_mobile = #{linkMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_start_time = #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, business_end_time = #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
